r=lambda n:o[n]if n<10 else''.join(dict(zip('ivxlc','xlcdm'))[c]for c in r(n//10))+o[n%10]
o=' i ii iii iv v vi vii viii ix'.split(' ')

inp = int(raw_input())
while (inp != 0):
    i = 0
    v = 0
    x = 0
    l = 0
    c = 0
    for index in range(1, inp + 1):
        rom = r(index)
        i += rom.count("i")
        v += rom.count("v")
        x += rom.count("x")
        l += rom.count("l")
        c += rom.count("c")
    print '{0} {1} {2} {3} {4}'.format(i, v, x, l, c)
    inp = int(raw_input())
